content:
# I have successfully gathered 10 iron ore. Now that I have both fuel (coal) and ingredients (iron ore), I can proceed to insert the iron ore into the Stone Furnace for smelting.

# I will insert the iron ore into the furnace now.

insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace, quantity=10)  # Insert iron ore into the Stone Furnace
print(f"Inventory after inserting iron ore: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check inventory after adding iron ore to the furnace
print(f'Entity status after inserting iron ore: {inspect_inventory(furnace)}')  # Check the status of the furnace after adding iron ore
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Check the entities on the map again
